attributes.action: Block the Peerage of Michael Martin the current Speaker of The House of Commons.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask that Michael Martin not be elevated to the Noble House of Lords. He resigned his position as Speaker due to a lack of confidence in his ability and fairness to perform that duty expressed by fellow MPs and the undersigned do not wish failure and incompetence to be rewarded.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
